name: BoomSweeperVR
summary:
Hands > Mice

It’s as simple as that! BoomSweeperVR is a classic puzzle game re-imagined from a whole new perspective. Sit back, kick your feet up, and unwind with one of the most addictive and beloved games of all time. Only this time, playing feels more fun than ever! Featuring three levels of difficulty for both newcomers and seasoned 90’s desktop veterans.

In BoomSweeperVR, your only goals are to relax and solve puzzles. In front of you, you see a board with covered tiles on it. Your goal is to...
